mapper.select: select count(w.id) from ht_workflow w inner join ht_workname n on w.workname_id=n.id left join ht_admin a on a.id =w.update_user

select w.id,w.workname_id businessId,n.work_name businessName,w.mail_notifier mailWarningUser, date_format(w.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')createTime,w.create_user createUser,w.update_user updateUser, (select a.truename from ht_admin a where a.id = w.create_user) createUserName, date_format(w.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')updateTime, (select a.truename from ht_admin a where a.id = w.update_user) updateUserName, w.flow_status processStatus,w.check_status auditFlag, case when w.flow_status=1 then '正常' else '异常' end processStatusString, case when w.check_status=1 then '是' else '否' end auditFlagString from ht_workflow w inner join ht_workname n on w.workname_id=n.id where w.id=#{id}

select n.role role,n.workflow_id businessId,n.flow_order flowNodeNum ,n.admin_id auditUser, case when n.role=1 then r.role_name when n.role=2 then a.truename end auditUserName from ht_workflow_node n left join ht_admin a on a.id =n.admin_id left join ht_admin_role r on r.id =n.admin_id where n.workflow_id=#{businessId}

select id,truename,email,CONCAT(id,',',truename,',',email)mailWarningUser from ht_admin where del_flag = 0 and state=0
and truename like CONCAT(#{truename},'%')

SELECT w.id, w.workname_id as businessId, n.work_name as businessName, w.mail_notifier as mailWarningUser FROM ht_workflow w INNER JOIN ht_workname n ON w.workname_id = n.id WHERE w.flow_status = 1 AND w.check_status = 1;

select t.workflowid,t.mailWarningUser,t.workname,t.userid,t.truename from (
select wn.workflow_id as workflowid, wf.mail_notifier as mailWarningUser,wk.work_name as workname,am.id as userid,am.truename as truename from ht_workflow_node wn LEFT JOIN ht_admin_and_role ar on ar.role_id = wn.admin_id LEFT JOIN ht_admin am on ar.user_id = am.id LEFT JOIN ht_workflow wf on wf.id = wn.workflow_id LEFT JOIN ht_workname wk on wk.id = wf.workname_id where wn.role=1 and am.state=0 and am.del_flag=0
UNION ALL
select wn.workflow_id as workflowid, wf.mail_notifier as mailWarningUser,wk.work_name as workname,am.id as userid,am.truename as truename from ht_workflow_node wn LEFT JOIN ht_admin am on am.id = wn.admin_id LEFT JOIN ht_workflow wf on wf.id = wn.workflow_id LEFT JOIN ht_workname wk on wk.id = wf.workname_id where wn.role=2 and am.state=0 and am.del_flag=0 ) t
